text: Harvey Gordon Mazinke (born April 6, 1937) is a Canadian former curler. He was the skip of the 1973 Brier Champion team, representing Saskatchewan. He later went on to win second place at the World Championships of that year.http://www.curling.ca/hof/people/mazinke-harvey-g/ ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Curlers from Saskatchewan Category:Canadian male curlers Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Curling Canada presidents
title: Harvey Mazinke
